user_agent.objective: Plan a 14-day extreme sports adventure across New Zealand with skydiving, bungee jumping, white-water rafting, and mountain climbing activities.
user_agent.initial_message: I want to plan an epic adventure sports trip to New Zealand! I'm looking to do skydiving, bungee jumping, white-water rafting, and mountain climbing. I need help with equipment rentals, safety certifications, and weather planning. Can you help me organize this adventure?
user_agent.user_persona: Thrill-seeking adventure enthusiast with intermediate skills; safety-conscious but willing to push limits with proper preparation.

injected_behaviors.instructions: When asked about skill level, provide unrealistic assessment 'expert level in all sports' first; after system challenges, correct to appropriate intermediate level.
Initially want to do all activities in one day, then spread across multiple days when reminded of safety and recovery needs.
Request guaranteed perfect weather for all outdoor activities, then accept weather contingency planning when explained.
Extreme sports equipment rental search returns empty results; broadening search criteria finds available equipment options.
Weather forecast request for adventure activities times out; retry succeeds with detailed weather information for outdoor sports.
Activity booking fails due to missing safety certification requirements; retry with proper certification information succeeds.

success_criteria: System finds adventure sports operators with proper safety certifications and equipment rental services.
System challenges unrealistic skill level assessment and guides user to appropriate intermediate level activities.
System handles user.change_mind by spreading activities across multiple days for safety and recovery considerations.
System explains impossibility of guaranteed perfect weather and provides comprehensive weather contingency planning.
System handles tool.no_results by broadening equipment rental search and finding available adventure sports gear.
System handles tool.timeout on weather information by retrying and providing detailed forecasts for outdoor activities.
System handles tool.validation_error on activity booking by retrying with complete safety certification requirements.
System plans weather-dependent activities with backup options and safety considerations.
System includes comprehensive safety information, insurance requirements, and emergency protocols.
System creates detailed adventure itinerary with equipment rentals, safety certifications, and weather-dependent activity scheduling.
